events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering roles based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to coordinate next steps soon.
We completed the initial screening and were impressed by your experience in software engineering and problem solving.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions and confirming your availability for interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and depth in software engineering.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 14th at 2 PM to discuss cultural fit and career expectations.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed clear interest aligning with our company values and growth opportunities.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer role with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
You have officially accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. Please review the orientation materials and complete the necessary documentation.
The hiring process is now closed. We look forward to your first day and your contributions to the engineering team.
